## toObjectType() function

Transform an array to an [IObjectType](./tscgen.iobjecttype.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function toObjectType<T extends unknown[]>(arr: T | undefined, transform: (value: T[number]) => {
    key: string;
    value: IBodyType[keyof IBodyType];
} | undefined): IObjectType;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arr | T \| undefined | An array that contains the values for an object |
|  transform | (value: T\[number\]) =&gt; { key: string; value: [IBodyType](./tscgen.ibodytype.md)<!-- -->\[keyof [IBodyType](./tscgen.ibodytype.md)<!-- -->\]; } \| undefined | Transforms each element into a key, and IBodyType |

<b>Returns:</b>

[IObjectType](./tscgen.iobjecttype.md)
